Articles.Content:
So when i switch symmetry on i can only attach parts vertically middle of other parts.. like decouplers,girders or docking ports to a fuel tank or anything only attach in middle.

bought the game when 0.22 came out and never had this problem before..

is there a key for vertical symmetry or something?

sry bad english.

There is an option in the settings.cfg called VAB_ANGLE_SNAP_INCLUDE_VERTICAL.

Make sure this is set to false

A bit more info might be required. Are you talking about VAB or SPH? Is the tank you're trying to attach things to horizontal or vertical?

Just post some screenshots showing your troubles and it'll be a lot easier to answer.
Since this is asking for rather than providing info, eased on over into gameplay questions.
